arts.ttl: Bayern Munich XI vs Union Berlin – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich visit the Stadion An der Alten Försterei on Saturday as they face Union Berlin, with the Bundesliga champions keen to preserve their flawless record this season. Bayern, unbeaten in their last sixteen outings across all competitions, are chasing a remarkable 17th straight win. Union Berlin will be eager to end their barren spell […] The post Bayern Munich XI vs Union Berlin – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Bayern Munich preview: Leaders out to maintain perfect record
arts.sum: Bayern Munich will look to maintain their 100% record in the 2025-26 campaign when they travel to the Stadion An der Alten Försterei for Saturday's Bundesliga meeting with Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Kompany discusses possible rotation ahead of Union Berlin clash
arts.sum: Vincent Kompany has discussed the possibility of rotating his Bayern Munich squad for Saturday’s game against 1. FC Union Berlin.
